title: Enhancing AI Competencies: Client-Centered Mental Health Psychoeducation Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge in educational psychology and basic understanding of mental health
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design mental health psychoeducational programs by applying client-centered instructional methods
Learners can select instructional strategies considering learner engagement, environmental conditions, and content difficulty in VR simulation environments
Learners can develop and implement psychoeducational modules applicable to real educational settings through project-based assessment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
